info.name: saturation is cool (83 chars)
info.description:
for real light sources, sensors are saturated. But R,G,B intensity differs, + glow intensity, thus the nice resulting image.Real color is thus seen in the outside crown.
For realist astronomy image, see  [url]https://www.shadertoy.com/view/XdsGWs[/url]

renderpass.code:
#define mainImage(o,u)     \
  vec2 R = iResolution.xy; \
  o = vec4(1.7,1.4,1.2,1) - length(u+u-R)/R.y   /** ; o = step(1.,o) /**/
renderpass.name: Image
